name: Crumbling Facility
description:
Beware! The facility is out of control! Leakages, floors disappearing, monsters transported from other dimensions! Thankfully several computers can help you stabilize these systems simply interact with them by pressing "e".

Make sure not to deplete your resources: Platform Stability, Flood, Oxygen and Enemy Spawn rate

Platform Stability determines how much time before platforms randomly disintegrate

Flood determines how long before the facility is flooded by a deadly goop

Enemy Spawn Rate is self explanatory

And Oxygen determines your speed, its the easiest to forget, but doing so will cost you later down the line!

To refill a meter go to its computer) and press "E" to interact

All assets are my own except these sounds:

By deef

By thecheeseman

By SieuAmThanh

By jobro

I would really appreciate feedback! This is my first Game Jam but don't be afraid to criticize my project.
